tool.name: SAGA.contrib_perego.2
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayINPUT False output_data_RESULT $output_data_RESULT name SAGA.contrib_perego.2 INPUT $INPUT RX $RX RY $RY THRESH $THRESH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.outputType_RESULT transmissionMode_RESULT $OutputSection_RESULT.transmissionMode_RESULT

param.name: INPUT
param.label: Input
param.help: This must be your input data of type grid. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: THRESH
param.label: Threshold
param.help: The values in the specified radius is used in the average calculation only if its difference with the central value is lesser or equal to this threshold.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULT
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Average 3 With Thereshold for Grids calculates average in X and Y distances unsing only the values that differ form central pixel less than a specified threshold. Each value has a weight which is inversely proportional to the distance (method 2).
